song.title: Smooth Operator
song.info:
basehead/fm greets out to dizzy and vinnie among others for some of these great samples. composed for my new music coming soon!!!
peace!
FM - hitting hard in da '95!
big ups go out to White Noise for doing the orig. riff that the theme of this song was based on... (the bass riff) so if you see him on IRC, (WNoise), tell him his bassline kicks booty...
